food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A furry animal loves to eat me
💛 My color is the same as the sun
〰️ I am curved like a smile

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a big farm animal
🥛 I am often poured from a carton

food.question: I am red and juicy, and grow on a tree. An apple a day keeps the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a very common fruit
❤️ My color is like a heart

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🟠 My color is similar to an orange

food.question: I am small and green, and grow in a pod. You might eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a pod with other siblings

food.question: I am round and you can slice me. I am often red but sometimes green. What am I?
I am a fruit that is long and purple. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💜 I can be used for jelly.
🐒 This fruit comes in a bunch.

food.question: I am a yellow spread that is made from milk. You can spread me on bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can spread me on toast.

food.question: I am made of flour, water and yeast. I am baked in an oven and you can make a sandwich with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You use me when you make a sandwich.

food.question: I am a frozen treat that comes in many flavors. I am often eaten in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold and melt easily
🌈 I come in many different colors

ocean.question: I am big and blue, fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 Boats float on top of me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You might see me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze into tight spaces.
💙 I have suckers on my arms.

ocean.question: I am a big animal that swims and spouts water from a hole on my head. What am I?
I'm a very colorful fish, and people keep me in tanks. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I live in a glass house in some homes.

ocean.question: I’m long and flat and swim near the bottom. I look like a pancake!

hints.text: ⚡️ I can give you a shock.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and can pinch with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 Some of us are red when cooked.

ocean.question: I live in the sea and sparkle like stars, but I'm not a real star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have arms like a star.
🖐️ I can grow back an arm if I lose it.
🌊 I stick to things with my arms.

ocean.question: I'm a very big mass of trash that did not sink. I carry all of your garbage. What am I?

hints.text: 🗑️ I'm very big and floating in the ocean.

ocean.question: I live in the ocean, but I’m not a fish or animal. I’m like a colorful underwater garden. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of limestone from tiny creatures.
🌈 I come in many bright colors.
